name: Sorev
appearance: Square-shouldered in stormglass plates and salt-stained blue, cropped black hair, scar across the jaw from a chain-snap.
character: Disciplined, proud of the Wardens’ oath, convinced that predictability keeps the city alive.
talents: can hear false cadence in shouted reports
flaws: blind spot for patronage from ‘respectable’ houses
dreams: Stamp out the Veiled Current’s smuggler arteries
Win undisputed authority over all harbor beacons
secrets: Accepts ‘expediency gifts’ from Salt Gate merchants to shuffle inspection schedules
Keeps a smuggler’s codebook taken from a dead corsair and consults it off-record
